title: Alpina Sports Alaska Leather Backcountry Cross Country Nordic Ski Boots
features: The Ultimate all leather supportive back-country ski boot
Full grain leather uppers provide durability and support
Rottefella NNN-BC sole works in all NNN-BC system bindings, manual or automatic
Alpitex waterproof breathable membrane helps keep your keep drier
Thinsulate brand insulation for added warmth
description: Description Built to keep you warm and dry while you are pushing your touring boundaries. Made with a natural leather upper and Alpitex waterproof membrane to keep you dry, the Alaska has a medium flex so you can glide on the flats, and still maneuver in the steeps. Features: Natural Leather Upper Alpitex membrane BC Last Medium Boot Flex Anatomic Footbed Reinforced Rubber Rand Thinsulate insulation Rubber protection Natural leather Medium boot flex BC last Anatomic footbed Alpitex membrane
